about_the_game:
Introducing Snail Juice, a thrilling platform adventure with stunning graphics. Take on the role of a charming blue alien determined to rescue his cherished snail companions from the impending threat of a menacing juice factory. Armed with a variety of weapons, navigate through the zany world of Snail Juice, engaging in battles to liberate your snail friends.

While basic actions like running, jumping, and shooting are easy to master, players will find themselves immersed in intricate-level puzzles. Progressing through the game requires skilful maneuvering, including entering codes, activating switches, unlocking doors, rescuing allies, guiding them to safety, and utilizing vending machines to acquire vital supplies like extra lives, snacks, energy drinks, and explosives. Teleport yourself, jump on the subway or hack the Robo Remote and wirelessly control your enemies.

Inspired by the beloved classic, Abe's Oddysee, Snail Juice guarantees an unforgettable experience for both seasoned fans and newcomers alike. Embark on this epic journey and dive into the enchanting universe of Snail Juice.

short_description: Reminiscent of Abe's Odyssey and Rayman. Journey through challenging levels to rescue snail friends trapped in a juice factory, facing off against relentless robots and security guards. Trade lives for cash, equip yourself with bombs and ammunition to conquer obstacles and snack on junk food.
